description:
Rachel, a tomboy whose hobby is experimenting with magic.
Ethan, a childhood friend of Rachel is the subject of her experimentation.

After drinking a suspicious potion which Rachel gifted him,
Ethan fell asleep and woke up with an ominous energy. 

 'Who's next to me?' 

With her silky ultramarine hair scattered everywhere, 
The woman who was deeply asleep, smelled of fragrant flowers. 

“...... Rachel?' 

Like his lost pupils, his voice scattered and trembled in the air.
With her white shoulders exposed, she said with a small breath. 

“...... darling?' 

Ethan's face, which was like a stone wall, fell to pieces in an instant.>
